sentences.en: A hatchery facility includes racks a plurality of such trays loaded with eggs.
sentences.cn: 孵化厂包括支承多个装有蛋的托盘的支架.

sentences.en: Running along the brook, down to the hatchery, what heavenly joy this was when school was over!
sentences.cn: 放学后，有什么比沿着小溪跑到孵卵处更能给人如在天堂般的快乐！

sentences.en: Such an area should be sealed off from the poultry pens or hatchery.
sentences.cn: 这些地方同鸡舍或孵化室之间应完全隔绝.

trans.tran_en: A hatchery is a place where people control the hatching of eggs, especially fish eggs
